title: ImportError: cannot import name 'ModelMetaclass' from 'pydantic.main'
author: yvanblanchard
body:
Hello,

I have this error when running app.py script:

> ImportError: cannot import name 'ModelMetaclass' from 'pydantic.main' (c:\xxx\venv\lib\site-packages\pydantic\main.py)

Any idea ?
thank you.
